feed.title: File Browser Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.30.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 6ca3d5a5 chore(release): 2.30.0
  • 3b48f753 fix: add overlay for sidebar on mobile (#3197)
  • 4c5b612c fix: shell window size (#3198)
  • e336a25a fix: current folder name in page title (#3200)
  • c9e05f98 chore: Optimize upload indicator display (#3202)
  • be62f567 feat: Enhance MIME Type Detection for Additional File Extensions (#3183)
  • 2e47a038 feat: allow multi-select with SHIFT key in singleClick mode (#3185)
  • a9c327cc fix: The file type icon in the file list is sensitive to the case of the suffix name (#3187)
  • 782375b1 fix: Fixing the inability to play MKV video files online and enhancing the auxiliary features of the VideoPlayer. (#3181)
  • 5d5e8ed4 chore: update zh-cn.json and zh-tw.json (#3186)

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.31.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 2369e5c0ed6c8bef4da81c3e7b55cb47c23bdd38 chore(release): 2.31.0
  • 056cfa8facdca4c397a6b245028d4c9d3f0ca518 build: fix goreleaser file
  • e7d77106ab1c6e5aa57a7466766b76d2e7cf9eac Merge pull request #3436 from filebrowser/go_1.23.0
  • a6347c88586e584b4565277b0010fa9ff2576b1f build: bump golangci-lint to 1.60.3
  • b596567c6163d57eaefbf3e30d84cfca65c24cdf build: bump go libs
  • 364fdaaf0c1eace82ff8637d337cc1b32e5e9972 build: bump go version to 1.23.0
  • 8b75aefb1cbaf03cf01e38f1ce9c18a5196821b2 chore: fix frontend audit
  • b0f4604f44e6a35e07df3000f106f523cd942cfc feat: implement markdown file preview in Ace editor (#3431)
  • f6f7e5fea3ff7073ee652008a51cb5445a6f3d5d feat: support mime type for epub extension (#3425)
  • 043cdbf402eccc5c09fcedd54987582ca745c59f chore: minor fixup to Ukrainian translation (#3421)
  • 8e67a12f260caefcbe419c2281025b9b15f02bf3 feat: add Czech translation (#3416)
  • 83898d616fdd163f43db7aa58e6612cec6b22d94 chore: fix frontend lint
  • 090272e3b7c56a940c4aa2d28f860c574aa17d53 fix: fix catalan i18n file
  • 10bf3cffbf8eb7d95fe4e1cc6acf1012329744b9 fix(frontend): N files selected hint use i18n (#3390)
  • 99a6382b320874e94f9bd74708f46dd9a7485d3c feat: Added epub preview. Resolves #3375 (#3376)
  • a53aac1c30419c1a859542e8ce2c6db5863b96ef chore: Add Catalan Language (#3347)
  • 21783ed91a13ad52afdb411e43faf14fb6ef6e42 fix: pull down to refresh within editor (#3378)
  • 7be564495226bc6846289a56edb8893511036c6e fix: fixing an issue where the upload indicator would "jump" around in the UI (#3354)
  • 30a8ddf113862e3de2c09547662b7f2af8a30dfe build(deps): bump golang.org/x/image from 0.15.0 to 0.18.0 (#3335)
  • c3465f99136506d51b813be4f31b289e708da0ce build(deps-dev): bump ws from 8.16.0 to 8.17.1 in /frontend (#3321)
  • e8589be6409a2b29edd44ee2edd3fbf6b2d72724 build(deps-dev): bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 in /frontend (#3316)
  • eb3978ea5517c536f5aa69646be2f6a0b1784685 chore(frontend): fix formatting
  • d6cdf0e4351b58c67f07dbc9fe58856bee54aac7 chore: listing.list name auto wrap (#3208)
  • 1fccc5d649add2a56c55e75cf9dec4851e6d7cbf fix: clipboard copy in safari (#3261)
  • a8388689f3019083f263845900f683ddc13884dc fix: pdf preview header (#3274)
  • 2a90cdfdaff8655c7cb1167c01994a0978dece8f fix: CSS selectors for listing icons (#3277)

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.31.1

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.31.2
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 129a4fd39d550bd2a449575cf93f061593e39102 chore(release): 2.31.2
  • 64400ffda8b09f66b8662a3c9400235139800a4d fix: files list alignment (#3494)
  • 03d74ee7582196c09720f8d488056339f06c446c build(deps): bump rollup from 4.21.3 to 4.22.4 in /frontend (#3504)
  • 2b37e696c9bde4d0c453de236a3555d982346bbb fix: added whitespace before version (#3510)
  • 21d5ee1b97e9d553e299cd739e4539909e2ff03d chore: bump 'actions/stale' to latest version (#3489)
  • ec7b643e8e9499f7ff226ec7f8e63a9df9890352 build(deps-dev): bump vite from 5.2.7 to 5.4.6 in /frontend (#3496)
  • d729701bd47cb71863b00567c7f21b5a20fc0f32 chore: fix typos (#3490)
  • 406d4f78845a1684df7c9c457b208f4dd9b2a930 fix: change location of custom init scripts (#3493)
  • 1e7c41505fb6a3b9baa1534787492a186e09bcfb fix: german translation spelling typos (#3469)

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.32.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 3d6c5152fe22a4a47783253a3506a2930b7b6be3 chore(release): 2.32.0
  • ba797cda3135eddb9b7165dc5ceb932399cb54df build: fix go releaser
  • 5300d00d2e7dbb80a252aff57e100113f02506c3 fix: Fix user creation on proxy auth (#3666)
  • bbdd313705b8d253f0c47ad717a6e47b2f46e719 fix: disk usage refreshing (#3692)
  • 045064f8b8bf9f86058e877448085e38da8b3f2e fix: add proper healthcheck for S6 containers (#3691)
  • 252f0a753323f7981fde1da22f2e08cdb69b531b chore: update ko.json (#3688)
  • 1194cfe0097a70399c1f06cf0f514b9d70fa463c build(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.23.0 to 0.33.0 (#3712)
  • 0201f9c5c4dd2a4d5a3503e59cdb8045e8d3a91f refactor: Fix eslint warnings (#3698)
  • cc331383fb3f0fd6ddbd775a29c82ee4c64f5012 chore: add translation for the "Hide dot files setting" in "es" (Spanish) language (#3704)
  • d1c84a84123c77dede05c023b3697a432b56122c fix: prompts disappearing on copy / move / upload (#3537)
  • e92dbb4bb8b7894264fbf0a48a641712c3b68766 build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.26.0 to 0.31.0 (#3634)
  • 209acf2429b06e2e8d78218937c59fd7e7edd1be feat: create user on proxy authentication if user does not exist (#3569)
  • 25372edb5c0e616e82b76b5f523633af57d347e0 build(deps): bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 in /tools (#3601)
  • d51a3438201274a1b826be1b775ca1035ade20c5 build: update to node 22 and pnpm (#3616)
  • 065959451d3ba12019c6151274aa4e6904cdca99 build(deps): bump vue-i18n from 9.10.2 to 9.14.2 in /frontend (#3618)
  • 2fdea73430011846276a1cda52458f1d670f5ea7 build(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 (#3574)
